metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2789 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in GNU cflow 1.7. It has been rated as problematic. This issue affects the function func_body/parse_variable_declaration of the file parser.c. The manipulation leads to denial of service. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-229373 was assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

criterions.comment: cflow package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
